code: import{useRef}from'react';import'./form.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Form(){var mealUrlref=useRef();var mealnameRef=useRef();var cuisineRef=useRef();var priceRef=useRef();var restaurantRef=useRef();function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();fetch("localhost:8000/meal",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Accept:"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({"image":mealUrlref,"name":mealnameRef,"restaurant":restaurantRef,"price":priceRef,"cuisine":cuisineRef})}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){return console.log(data);});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"Bootstrap heading postmeal",children:"POST MEAL"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"fname",type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"image_url",ref:mealUrlref}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"mealname",ref:mealnameRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"cuisine",ref:cuisineRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"price",ref:priceRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"restaurant",ref:restaurantRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"number",disabled:true,selected:true,children:"Rating"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"10",children:"1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"20",children:"2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"30",children:"3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"40",children:"4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"50",children:"5"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{href:"/",className:"btn2",children:"Submit"})]})]});}export default Form;
